home.my-name: Apasionado desarrollador de videojuegos y front-end. Actualmente me encuentro trabajando en un simulador multijugador de realidad virtual para la empresa Global Training Technology y estudiando la Licenciatura en informática en la Universidad Nacional de Quilmes

portfolio.sag-desc: Splash and go it's an Endless Runner 3D style game made in unity. Now avalaible on Playstore!
portfolio.jum-desc: It´s a 2D platform game with simple mecanics like jump and slide. Currently has only 10 simple levels, 1 boss level and 2 secret levels.
portfolio.rat-desc: Rock and troll it's a game that i made for a job selection process. All the assets were provided by the employment company.
portfolio.ball-desc: It's a puzzle videogame made for Android, at the moment it's under development.
portfolio.gc-foto: A full responsive portfolio page of a professional photographer built using react/bootstrap
portfolio.kanto: A simple page of the fictional region Kanto of the videogame Pokemon Blue/Red, built using react/bootstrap
